text.language: Ebolqen Dani/l pip~rov/t/c: e~repefc~mou eyouab swpi neman a~m/n efjw m~moc:
A reading from Daniel the prophet. May his holy blessings be with us. Amen.
Pembacaan dari Kitab Daniel sang Nabi, kiranya berkat berkat-nya beserta kita. Amin.
من دانيال النبي بركته المقدسة تکون معنا. آمين.
